channel.title: Point Clouds on XYZ
channel.description: Recent content in Point Clouds on XYZ

item.title: About
item.description: This is a collection of point clouds from photogrammetry and laser scanning recording the cultural heritage of landscapes. The team from Louisiana State University’s College of Art and Design includes Prof. Brendan Harmon, Prof. Nicholas Serrano, and Prof. William Ma. This research was supported by the LSU Center for GeoInformatics and funded by the National Park Service’s Historic Preservation Fund.
